overview: June 25, 2001, Copps Coliseum, Hamilton, ON, Canada. Setlist: Setlist: Hellbound, 5 Minutes Alone, Slaughtered, Goddamn Electric (with Kerry King), War Nerve, Mouth for War, Becoming (with Throes of Rejection Outro), Revolution is my Name, Strength Beyond Strength, I'll Cast a Shadow (with 25 Years Outro), Fucking Hostile, This Love, Primal Concrete Sledge, Cowboys from Hell, Walk
title: Pantera - Live in Hamilton, ON
